0C1818B34B2B6C5A25DBF7B1BDAFF04B: Allows for customization of the map and minimap.
5E2D1A494956CC11EF1F9FA581C06AAB: Allows for customization of the map and minimap.
80B732B648E5B77E17EACC9263A42DBC: Allows for customization of the map and minimap.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.ActivateForAll.De: Activate this map for all players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.ActivateForPlayer: Activate this map for the instigating player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.MinimapShape.Desc:
Allows you to set the shape of the minimap.
Default will use the player's default setting.
Deactivate this map for all players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.DeactivateForPlay: Deactivate this map for the instigating player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.MapCaptureBoxHeig: Defines the height of the activation volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.MapCaptureBoxSize: Defines the size of the map capture area.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.EnabledAtGameStar: Determines whether the device is active at the start of the game, or whether you need to enable it manually before it will function.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.MapWalkingOpacity: How much opacity the map has while walking
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.MinimapZoomFactor:
How zoomed in the minimap is.
A larger number means a higher level of zoom.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.TransparentMinima: If ON, the minimap will be slightly transparent.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.MinimapLockPlayer:
If ON, the minimap will rotate to match the player's facing direction.
Default will use the player's default setting.
If Off, the game info panel on the full screen map will be hidden.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.InvertClassSelect: If On, players of any class other than Applies To Class can have the map applied.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.InvertTeamSelecti: If On, players on all teams other than Applies To Team can have the map applied.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.ActivateOnTrigger: If On, the controller will activate for players entering the zone, and deactivate when players leave the zone.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.ActivateAutomatic: If On, the controller will apply to players automatically on game start.
If On, the entire map displays in the minimap panel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.AppliesToClass.De: Players must be of this class for the map to apply.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.AppliesToTeam.Des: Players must be on this team for the map to apply.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.CustomMapMaskMate:
Replace the default map mask with a pre-authored material.
Applies only if either 'Custom Map Material' or 'Custom Map Texture' is set.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.CustomMapMaterial:
Replace the default scene capture map with a pre-authored material.
Takes priority over 'Custom Map Texture'
Replace the default scene capture map with a pre-authored texture.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MapController_C.MapPriority.Descr: When multiple devices are active, the one with the highest value is used.
